short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your favorite products from all over the web to Twigano

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twigano is a social shopping platform and enthusiasts' community. With Twigano, you can collect your favorite products from all over the web and arrange them the way you want in groups, socialize with the community, inspire and get inspired and express yourself and buy the products you love.

Twigano Collector is a simple, easy and smart way to collect your favorite products from the web, put them in group and add them to Twigano. The products you add will be available for the whole community to use so keep sharing the products you love with them. All the magic starts with one click on the collector button.
